description: As Gary Rogers, the player battles through hordes of enemy spaceships in several missions, evading projectiles, asteroids and defeating powerful bosses. Gary collects debris from destroyed enemies and exchanges them at the home base for ship and weapon upgrades.

name: Chicaro Dentistry
description: It's a dental simulation game that treats a cow who visits a space shuttle dentist. It's a game where you can use the tools you need to cure tooth decay to heal a child's cavity.

name: Axeson's Fury VR
description: Axeson's Fury VR throws you into an intensely combative arcade style virtual reality environment that will have you fighting for your life and that of your family as society is turned by dark unknown forces. Become John Axeson and be all you can be... one mean slick fighting machine!

name: Hit Zero: Chronos
description: Hit Zero: Chronos is a 2D shooter game. You’re given the power to control time, time moves only when you move! Use your time stopping powers to erase every enemies in the area.

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing
description: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing is a species hunting fishing game from Dovetail Games about the passion and pursuit of what lurks beneath the waters. Take on the hunt of a lifetime as you target and pursue monster-sized fish around the world. With 35 species to hunt, you'll have to work up your strategy, skill and tactics to catch every boss fish in each venue. It'll take both patience and adrenaline to succeed as you choose your angling spot carefully, based on time of day, weather conditions and perfect equipment setup, before casting out into the water to battle and catch these elusive creatures.

name: Touhou Kikamu: Elegant Impermanence of Sakura
description: Touhou Kikamu ~ Elegant Impermanence of Sakura is a fangame of Touhou Project series, it manifests as a traditional STG like most official Touhou Project games.

name: Rival Stars Horse Racing: Desktop Edition
description: Play Rival Stars Horse Racing for the ultimate horse racing experience. Care for and train your own stable of horses, breed the perfect champion, manage a homestead ranch and race for victory!

name: Glitchy Apocalypse Simulator
description: DISCLAIMER: Made by one dev and his kid. Uses lots of assets. Glitchy Apocalypse Simulator is a comical physics-based game. The game is a light-hearted, comical sandbox and makes no attempts at realism or strategy.

name: SCP: Recontainment
description: Experience singleplayer and multiplayer initial containments, decontaminations and encounters with many of the SCP Foundation's scariest and most mysterious SCPs in the most ambitious SCP game to date.

name: A Day Without Me
description:
A Day Without Me is an intriguing adventure game with a high emphasis on puzzles. It combines adventure, horror and drama elements. Main character wakes up as the only person left in the whole city. Now he has to find out what’s happened, where has everyone gone and how to overcome a series of strange events happening in front of his own eyes.

This narrative exploration title features semi-open world, stylish isometric graphics and unrestful story of the sole person left in the city. Being just a teenager, this boy has to do a man’s job — solve plenty of puzzles and challenges to uncover the mystery of everyone’s disappearance. Are you ready for «A Day Without Me»?

name: Good Morning, World
description: Are you sure this is reality?

name: Holmgang: Memories of the Forgotten
description: Dracorum was a land of peace and prosperity, but King Haziel's death caused darkness and wickedness over the kingdom. Everything seems lost, but three heroes will rise against injustice... It is time to know their stories.

name: Infinity Heroes
description: Infinity Heroes is a simultaneous turn-based collectible hero card game. Features PC & Mobile crossplay, a single player Roguelike Adventure and Infinite Customization via name and card art replacement of every card with any image on your computer.

name: Cubic Chess
description: Cubic Chess is a twist on traditional Chess, setting the pieces onto a 3d cubic board, you can rotate, revolve and plan around the board itself and is perfect for players that want a new way to think of their favorite game, without too many more bells and whistles.

name: Puck Buddies
description: Puck Buddies is a bouncy multiplayer sports game that combines the best elements of hockey and minigolf into non-stop fun. Challenge your friends to pass, shoot, spin and bump into things in this chirpily competitive deflection derby. It's time to bounce!

name: Digitizer
description: Digitizer is a Sci-Fi action RPG set in a post-capitalist world. It’s a story-driven open-world game with multiple factions. Fight, craft, drive and make your story choices that will bring the conflict to its end.

name: Grim Tales: The Generous Gift - Collector's Edition
description: A mysterious birthday gift uncovers a sinister kidnapping plot!

name: Cloudscape
description:
Cloudscape is an open-world action adventure survival game.

You play as Kumo, a Cloudling who awakes on an uninhabited island. Explore the island and gather resources to make tools to help you survive and adventure further. At night, strange monsters will appear, ready to attack. Prepare yourself and keep a fire going to make it through the night. Survive long enough to escape the island and uncover new islands with new places to explore, new faces, and much more.

name: A Little Golf Journey
description: A Little Golf Journey is a relaxing adventure golf game played on beautiful diorama courses across a variety of destinations. Unlock secrets, discover treasure and take on challenges. Your journey awaits.

name: Space Station Manager
description: Space Station Manager is an exciting game where you own a space company, your main goal is to build a space station, make profit, grow your business, build an economical network, and expand beyond the solar system.

name: Go Kart Run!
description: Aim for 1st place! Collect and customize 20 drivers, race to increase your rank, make a comeback with food items and go insanely fast with 5 engine options!

name: Racingmaybe
description: A drag racing game with a complex upgrading system where driving faster than the speed of light is possible. Which is fast. Real. Fast. Even your rusty car can race this fast, if you're good. But first, see if you can break the soundbarrier

name: MagiKart: Retro Kart Racing
description: MagiKart: Retro Kart Racing is a retro inspired racing game that heavily borrows from some of the best (and worst) late 90s kart racers.

name: Golf Ace
description: Are you ready for an amazing golf experience with up to 12 different players? Complete on the 5 courses that has 18 poles. By completing courses faster than your friends, leave your friends behind on leaderboard and win! More courses, ball customizations and level editor will be added at earlyaccess

name: The Shadow Government Simulator
description:
The Shadow Government Simulator is a turn-based strategy game where you lead a secret society towards world domination. Investigate the influential and convert them to your faction via bribery, seduction and intimidation. Reshape society's power structures to fend off rival societies and the world's nations in your quest for power.

Inspired by old classics like Plague Inc. and modern gems like The Shrouded Isle, Puppet Master challenges the player to enter societies, discover the networks of power and reshape them to fit your agenda.

name: Bone Appetit
description: When the king declares that all food is now his, whatcha' gonna' do? Raise a skeleton slave to steal it back for you, of course!

name: Dawn at my Neighbourhood
description: Dawn at my Neighborhood is a tribute to classic 90s games, reworked with new mechanics and graphics inspired by N64 and PlayStation.

name: Ato
description:
Ato is an atmospheric sword dueling metroidvania game set in the era of feudal Japan. Every combat encounter is an intense duel to the death with its own personality and fighting style. Perform risky parry maneuvers, bounce off of your opponent, evade their attacks and unlock new abilities to further expand your arsenal of options against your adversaries.

Explore colorful and atmospheric environments. Obtain new abilities to solve environmental puzzles. Uncover the mystery of this world and experience a story that is told without a single word.

name: Briefcase Inc.
description: A hardcore precision platformer where you switch between three differently skilled characters to collect briefcases and make your way through levels.

name: Esothe
description: A journey of a lonely wanderer through a forgotten land, located on a plateau separated from the rest of the world by a high wall...

name: UnMetal
description: In 1972 a crack commando squad threw you in prison for a crime you didn't commit. UnMetal is a 2D stealth/action game (with a touch of humor) where the goal is to escape from an enemy military base.

name: Iwate Mountain Dance
description: Iwate Mountain Dance is a tough-as-nails bullet hell boss fighter. Take on unique multi-stage bosses in a grand dance of handcrafted fights, each with their own attack patterns and intense combos, as you explore the lands of Iwate and learn its history.

name: Get-A-Grip Chip
description: Get-A-Grip Chip is a charming and satisfyingly challenging grappling hook 2D platformer. Master the hook and fling through the increasingly intense floors of Roboco Mfg. Chuck Chip over chainsaws, launch over lasers, and even escape chases with Scan-It Janet.

name: Bird Missions
description: Live the life of your bird reigning in the air! Find one by one all the hidden pieces on each map and unlock new territories!

name: Making History: The First World War
description: A turn-based WWI Grand Strategy game. Rush to field new modern weaponry and survive the horrendous attrition battles. Join the global conflict between the Great Powers of the age and forge a new world order for freedom or tyranny.

name: March of Soldiers
description: March Of Soldiers is a real time strategy single player , It is a military game based on the player's skill and the strength of his financial economy

name: Squirrel Forest
description: Deforestation is an apocalypse for squirrels. Only a few trees are left standing. Squirrels are put in danger and forced to act. Two brothers Zen and Ven decide to restore harmony in the forest by uniting fellow survivors and embarking on a journey to replant the forest. They need you to help them!

name: Mossen Seikkailut
description: Mossen Seikkailut is an indie RPG adventure where you solve puzzles as a dog and face real-time fights on your way to glory. Gain respect by helping others and learn new fighting techniques to defeat those who oppose you. Experience all of this in magnificent 640x480 resolution!

name: Taimumari 2
description: 2D platformer, inspired by the best video games of the last century for people who are tired of metroidvanias. Someone has given the academy's students mysterious and dangerous powers, and Himari is about to find the truth.

name: Zatorski, Ph.D.
description: Indie-game in the genre of psychological adventure with the elements of rogue-like and visual novel. A meditative, thought-provoking simulator of an infinitely lonely old professor who's life and existence are questionable. Confusion, terror and despair are a part of a routine here.

name: About Love, Hate & the Other Ones 2
description: Influence the game world through LOVE and HATE. Talk to the OTHER ONES and make use of them for the perfect path to the level’s goal. The successor to the popular puzzle game "About Love, Hate & The Other Ones" has reached the third dimension.

name: Heartless Reseller is Roguelike
description: Roguelike action unfolds in supermarkets! We aim at the back of the dungeon while collecting various "resale items" in the supermarket. If you have some "resale items", the enemy "resale rogue" will attack the player and try to steal the "resale items". Timing is also important.

name: iB Cricket
description: A sport with 2.5 billion fans across the world is now in VR as iB Cricket (vSport). Step into immersive world-class stadiums with thousands cheering for you and our realistic physics makes it intuitive to learn within 10 mins. Hone your skills, compete in global tournaments & become a vSport star.

name: While (You) World.Create()
description: Solve puzzles by building different things for your automata! In the end, you will find that it is not just a video game...

name: One of
description: It's a story about two souls who want to be understood, but finally hurt each other.

name: The Indifferent Wonder of an Edible Place
description: The Indifferent Wonder of an Edible Place is a short, interactive tale about a building eater consuming a tower on the edge of the town of Matsyapura.

name: Ever Forward
description: A girl trapped in a strange world somewhere between reality and imagination. Help her find her way in this adventure puzzle game.

name: Tactical Troops: Anthracite Shift
description: Tactical Troops: Anthracite Shift is an indie turn-based tactical science-fiction game set on the beautiful yet dangerous planet of Anthracite. Command a troop of elite soldiers using an advanced teleportation technology and their overwatch technique.

name: The Vigilant Villa
description: "The Vigilant Villa" is a plot-to-text AVG reasoning adventure game, the classic Blizzard Mountain Villa mode, the game progress is driven by your reasoning and choice.

name: I saw the night
description: FPP single-player adventure game with scarce but surprising and violent shooter scenes. Unsettling and insightful thriller spiked heavily with philosofical but witty rejoinders and wry humor. Made in Unreal Engine 4.

name: Minnade Counter Fight
description: "Minnade Counter Fight" is a ramen cooking game based on the VR Ramen Shop Simulator "Counter Fight" that allows up to four players to enjoy local multiplayer. Familiar customers and robbers also appear. Find a playable character full of personality that suits you and head to the kitchen right now.

name: Buddy Simulator 1984
description: Thanks to next generation AI technology, BUDDY SIMULATOR 1984 simulates the experience of hanging out with a best buddy! Your buddy learns from you, constantly adapting to your interests and personality. But most importantly, your buddy can play games with you!

name: Diplomacy is Not an Option
description: In the RTS-game “Diplomacy is Not an Option” you will become a medieval feudal lord in a midlife crisis. Due to your position you must constantly make hundreds of decisions a day related with city management and economic development. You are tired of this monotonous and, so it seems, meaningless existence. But things are about to change: hordes of bloodlusted enemies, swarms of scary monsters and crowds of rebellious peasants at any second can bring some life to your working schedule.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2020
description: Become the manager of a cycling team and take them to the top! You will need to manage finances and recruitment, plan your training, implement your strategy and, new for this edition, look after your cyclists and their morale!

name: Divided Reigns
description: The full-scale, epic fantasy role-playing experience you've wanted for decades--Divided Reigns retains all that made the JRPG classics so fantastic while still feeling fresh. Expect strategic battles, an epic scale, well-developed characters, and a deep and emotional story.

name: Quiplash 2 Interlashional
description: The "say anything" party game is going international! All the hilarious content from Quiplash 2, now in French, Italian, German, and Spanish! With 100 new prompts in each language! (And you can still play in boring old English.)

name: Panzer Ball
description: Panzer Ball is about speed and agility. Complete races in this fast-paced 3D platformer that is inspired by the classic surf maps and bunnyhop modes from games of the past. This game includes both a singleplayer and a multiplayer experience. The online multiplayer is fully real-time so you can invite your friends and see who gets the fastest time. Join our community to get involved in experimental modes, early playtests and be part of the development of Panzer Ball.

name: My Adventure
description: A girl, a sword, some magic, an adventure.

name: The Night is Grey
description: A cinematic thriller told through the classic perspective of point & click adventure games. The Night is Grey is about modern storytelling fused together with hand-drawn animated characters, fully animated backgrounds and an original studio recorded music score.

name: Engine Evolution
description: Engine Evolution is a multiplayer racing game that uses similar principles as World of Tanks - with each PvP race, against 11 other players, you gain experience and credits, for which you can buy various upgrades for your bike, or unlock the next bike.

name: Nine Chronicles
description: Utilising groundbreaking technology, Nine Chronicles is a fantasy MMORPG powered by the players, set in a world that can never be shut down. Infinitely moddable and owned by the community, Nine Chronicles invites you to aid the goddess Freya in her eternal struggle against an evil ravaging the land.

name: The Prodigal Soul
description: The Prodigal Soul - a "survival horror" with elements of a "shooter", where you have to find out what happened to the main character and find out the cause of a mental disorder, thereby unraveling the cause of the tragedy ...

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Ch.8 Matsuribayashi
description: Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.

name: Roboshark Rampage
description: Roboshark Rampage is an endless cave swimmer which you simply won't be able to put down. Watch out! Don't get hit by an anchor or mine! There are dangers lurking everywhere.

name: Blast Rush Classic
description: Blasting is everything in this infinite-bomb shoot-em-up!

name: Peekaboo Collection - 3 Tales of Horror
description: Three horror games. Three different stories exerting you into dark twist, forcing you confront face to face with the creatures that lurk there.

name: Fire Escape
description: A neo-Hitchock murder mystery set in Brooklyn. When the clock strikes eight, a suspenseful thriller begins to unfold in real time. Watch closely from the fire escape as your suspicious neighbors embroil you in a simmering, interactive crime.

name: Movie World
description: In Movie World you can build your own movie studio. Produce entertaining and glamorous movies. Research new technologies to keep up with the industry. Expand into series, compete with other studios, receive the awards, create franchises and prevail in the movie business.

name: Astralode Freeminers
description: Take to the stars and harvest precious ore from wild asteroids! ASTRALODE Freeminers is asteroid mining puzzle action with an interstellar support crew of colorful misfits.

name: Drag
description: Drag is a time attack offroad racing game with physical suspension simulation and a tire model that allows for competitive racing. It can be played with gamepad or keyboard and supports racing wheels including force feedback.

name: Deeproot Manor
description: Your younger brother, Richard, has gone missing. There are rumors about an abandoned manor, deep inside the woods. Believing that to be your brother's last destination before his disappearance, you sneak out of your home and step forth into the forest...

name: Astronarch
description: A fusion of roguelikes and auto-battlers like never before seen. Recruit a party of mysterious heroes, navigate deadly lands, collect an arsenal of magical items, and vanquish a new evil threatening the realm!

name: Denial
description: Denial takes place inside your own dark mind, true or false, illusion or reality... It doesn't matter. It all feels the same and the stains on the walls still remain, maybe now it is time to clean them.

name: Escape From Violet Institute
description: 2D sidescrolling 1st Person Survival Horror game

name: Armoured Commander II
description: In Armoured Commander II, you take on the role of a tank commander in World War II. Featuring a roguelike focus on turn-based and procedurally-generated strategic gameplay, you must lead your tank crew through a multi-week campaign where your ultimate goal is simply to survive.

name: Rocking Legend
description: Play your virtual instrument (guitar or drums) in musically dynamic environments, progress into the campaign with the original soundtrack, or customize your experience with custom songs and gameplay modifiers! Multiple control schemes are available.

name: The Casebook of Arkady Smith
description: An open world investigation game set in a futuristic city. Take on the role of Arkady Smith, the famous investigator in this third person adventure game.

name: Flight of Nova
description: Flight Of Nova is a flight simulation in which you take control of spacecrafts on the full-scale planet NVA-31. You will fly on different types of machines during transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics.

name: Grab the Beat
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Arena
description: 2-4 Players Online or Local Play. Turn Based Strategy Board Game + Action Mini Games. Use items to max effect as you move around the board and combo to victory. Fast games (20 minutes total)! Fun for any evening or night with friends!

name: 6 People
description: A man travels in a subway car alone. Where is he going? Will he or any of his fellow passengers arrive at their destination? Are they drawn together by pure coincidence, or something more sinister?

name: Western Sigil
description: Western Sigil is a tower defense & resource management game with a dose of strategy, where you control units of unlikely allies. Shoot your way through the hordes of creatures and save Weird West from the spreading plague!

name: Unknown Ways
description: Buckle up and take a ride on this wholesome adventure to places you couldn't even imagine. Help this golem boy to find a way out of these forests and mountains.

name: Balls Royale
description:
Bases, paddles and balls... you know what it is!
Now in Battle Royale version!

Balls Royale is 50 players Battle Royale inspired by classic arcade game.
Massive cross-platform multiplayer free-for-all rounds.

Game is available for PCs on Steam and for free for Android on Google Play and iOS on App Store. Players from different platforms can compete with each other in online games and world ranking!

name: Discreet
description: Are you a thief? Then your mission will be to steal the most objects without the owner seeing you. You are the owner ? You will do everything to protect your house, go for a stop thieves!

name: Impact
description: A stylish and visceral single-player FPS featuring a fluid stunt system, destructible voxel environments, loads of bullet time, a unique one-armed protagonist, and a dark electronic soundtrack.
